title: Game is fun as f--k guys.
body:
You go on a new account in lower tiers you abuse the living life out of everyone trying to close out the game slowly cause all of your team dies consistently. Then they decide to ff. Cause all they do is int while you do all the work. Fun.. good thing you removed Solocarry potential.

Like we try not to be toxic but you force us lmfao.

replies.body: Then leave, if you cant handle playing a team game and acting maturely.

This isn't exactly informative or helpful. I can understand the sentiment, but simply telling people to get out when they are clearly expressing that they are frustrated or don't understand why the game isn't working the way they expect.

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=03bXRPV4,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-29T21:21:59.166+0000)
>
> This isn't exactly informative or helpful. I can understand the sentiment, but simply telling people to get out when they are clearly expressing that they are frustrated or don't understand why the game isn't working the way they expect.

Because, as you can see from OP, OP is a salty little shit.
You are essentially kicking somebody while they are already down. Salt on their part is a terrible reason to attack them.

We are responsible for our own behavior. Riot is not forcing us to do anything. If we are toxic, it is our choice. There are alternative choices such as learning the communication and leadership skills necessary to truly carry a team.

If your teammates are too heavy, it may be because you insulted them and made them uncooperative. If you don't want them to surrender the game and if you want them to follow your lead then try treating them with the respect you want them to treat you with. I've found it goes a long ways towards making people want to listen and help.

respect is equal to muting everyone at 00.05 and telling them to ignore the 0-8 toplaner at 8minutes for their own sake.

me and everyone else arent supposed to baby people for them to not ff when they have a dude carrying them hard. I'm not mad i lost  agame on a random account i'm mad that riot has gutted the solocarry potential cause even people 3k lp below you can run down mid and win against you.

your definition of respect is seriously lacking.

this is a team game and as such, if you want to truly shine and carry it you are going to need to be able to work with and lead a team of strangers if you want to "carry" lesser skilled players than you. just being mechanically good at the game doesn't entitle you to carry a full team to victory. teamwork will outweigh a single good player in almost every game.

learn to play nice with your teammates, not just mute and ignoring them, or accept that you can't carry, after all.

team game. not solo game.

dont teach me about macro when i climbed to low chall mmr simply by macro early season 6. 
Macro means shit its all about if botlane won at every elo and it's garbage thats why everyone hates this game,

not everyone, just people who can't play nice with others.

if bot lane matters that much, then find a way to elevate and assist your bot lane.

your previous success doesn't entitle you to future success.

adapt. or don't.

but the path to success is laid out before you. you know what you have to do to experience better games. it's up to you whether or not  you step up and do it.
Become a toxic Draven onetrick. you are right. thank you for shedding light.
That is definitely not their point. There was no need to be facetious as you were here.

your determination to stay negative and sarcastic will only fuel your continued failure an displeasure playing league.

honestly sounds like you should probably take a break from the game and find other sources of entertainment or relaxation. league is obviously not good for you.

best of luck, mate. not that you deserve any luck with such a poor attitude.
I deserve and every other league player more than one viable ways of enjoying the game. But we dont get that. and dont you worry i got a bunch of books and good girl to keep me entertained.

In saying that, you are entirely missing the point. The point is that League is a team game, and in order to have the best chances of winning you need more than just personal skill or game knowledge.

It takes communication and teamwork skills to truly outmaneuver the enemy team and push through to a victory. If teammates are being uncooperative or they keep giving up, you should probably take a look at your own behavior to see if there is something you might be doing that makes them want to stop playing.

There are plenty of simple techniques that you can apply to keep up team morale and to prevent them from tilting. And if you can't accept that or you do not like it then maybe league is the wrong type of game for you. There are other games out there where you can win on personal skill alone, League just isn't that type of game.
